issue.message: This call references a method added in API level 26; however, the containing class androidx.contentpager.content.ContentPager is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.
This call references a method added in API level 26; however, the containing class androidx.contentpager.content.Query is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.
This call references a method added in API level 16; however, the containing class androidx.contentpager.content.Query is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.
This call references a method added in API level 16; however, the containing class androidx.contentpager.content.Query is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.
This call references a method added in API level 16; however, the containing class androidx.contentpager.content.Query is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.
